name: Doomsday Walker
description:
In this game, the player takes on the role of a walker with great parkour skills and travels through a crumbling city at the onset of the apocalypse. The main objective of the game is to climb to the top of the city tower and escape.

The core gameplay is parkour, where players need to use their quick reflexes and precision to jump, sprint, cartwheel and wall climb their way through the city. There are also plenty of cliff edges and slopes to challenge your parkour skills through these extremely difficult terrains.

Mode of operation:

Move-wasd

Camera control - mouse movement

Crouch-c

Acceleration-left shift

Glide-capslock

Hook-lock-right mouse button

Jump-space

Pause -tab

This game material is completely free and non-commercial.
